mapper.select: SELECT * FROM coffees ORDER BY id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coffees (productName, countryOfOrigin, degreeOfRoasting, aroma, acidity, bitterTaste, sweetTaste, rich, priceOf100g, priceOf200g) VALUES (#{productName}, #{countryOfOrigin}, #{degreeOfRoasting}, #{aroma}, #{acidity}, #{bitterTaste}, #{sweetTaste}, #{rich}, #{priceOf100g}, #{priceOf200g})
mapper.update: UPDATE coffees SET productName = #{coffee.productName}, countryOfOrigin = #{coffee.countryOfOrigin}, degreeOfRoasting = #{coffee.degreeOfRoasting}, aroma = #{coffee.aroma}, acidity = #{coffee.acidity}, bitterTaste = #{coffee.bitterTaste}, sweetTaste = #{coffee.sweetTaste}, rich = #{coffee.rich}, priceOf100g = #{coffee.priceOf100g}, priceOf200g = #{coffee.priceOf200g} WHERE id = #{id}
